QuestData.Title: Local Support
QuestData.Description: We've reached a deadlock with the Horde in Grizzly Hills. Our forces are just about evenly matched and all signs so far have pointed to a stalemate.$B$BUntil this morning, that is. The local trappers have requested our help. Apparently the Horde took something that belongs to them... a relic of some sort.$B$BWe get this back for them and they'll give us the edge we need. Head to the Evergreen Trading Post, west of Conquest Hold and look for a cedar chest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lieutenant Dumont at Amberpine Lodge wants you to go to Evergreen Trading Post and obtain the Cedar Chest.
QuestData.RewardText: It's locked, isn't it? It looks pretty ordinary.$B$B<Lieutenant Dumont Shakes the chest, producing a rattling wooden sound.>$B$BNo matter, I suppose. If this gets us the edge we need against the Horde, then I could care less if the cure for the Plague was in there.
